price: Wͻ’bεka sε: ”Sε yetiee (Asomafoͻ no asεm no), anaasε yε’dwenee ho a, anka y’ammεka Amane hunu gya no mu foͻ no ho.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
